definition: to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

sentences.english: In the context of Buddhist teachings and practice, these are all compassionate actions.
sentences.chinese: 从佛学教义来看，以上皆为慈悲行径。

sentences.english: The United States strongly condemns the act of aggression that led to their deaths.
sentences.chinese: 美国强烈谴责导致这些水兵丧生的侵略行径。

sentences.english: The intruders' tyrannical behavior led the local people to revolt.
sentences.chinese: 略者的残虐的行径，激起了当地民众的反抗。

sentences.english: Looking at it, Zi Gong felt it was out of convenance.
sentences.chinese: 子贡看见这样的行径，大不以为然。

sentences.english: See ShangQian struggle, zhuo or will inform ShangQian exclusive news.
sentences.chinese: 看见尚谦的拼搏行径，卓或便将独家消息告知尚谦。

sentences.english: Tang told Arafat that the Chinese government strongly denounces the aggressive activities of Israel.
sentences.chinese: 他说，中国政府对以色列的侵略行径予以强烈谴责。

sentences.english: Since he is a man of two minds, unstable in all his ways.
sentences.chinese: 三心两意的人，在他一切的行径上，易变无定。

sentences.english: Firms have a responsibility not to ever act unethically .
sentences.chinese: 商店有责任避免不道德的行径。

sentences.english: Reports the same month from Laos revealed the ongoing poaching of tiger.
sentences.chinese: 当月老挝报道称，偷猎老虎的行径仍没有得到遏制。

sentences.english: I mean, there was such hooliganism and vandalism.
sentences.chinese: 我的意思是，有这样的无赖行径和破坏行为。

sentences.english: We discovered two great hikes only minutes from the downtown sprawl.
sentences.chinese: 我们发现两大远足行径距市中心仅需几分钟。

sentences.english: The United Nations released a statement strongly denouncing the abduction and killing.
sentences.chinese: 联合国发表了一份声明，强烈谴责绑架和谋杀行径。

sentences.english: it's a way of exoticizing and infantilizing a foreign culture.
sentences.chinese: 这是一种将外国文化异化幼稚化的恶劣行径。

sentences.english: Or to stop massive slaughter in Central Africa?
sentences.chinese: 或者阻止中非的大规模屠杀行径？

sentences.english: I'd never met such crudity before.
sentences.chinese: 我从未见过这样粗鲁的行径。

definition: to go against the tide (idiom); to do things all wrong/to try to turn back history/a perverse way of doing things
bad record (esp. of a public official)/unsavory track record
breaking faith and abandoning right (idiom); to betray/treachery/perfidy
to criticize harshly/to denounce/to attack viciously
variant of 污衊|污蔑[wu1 mie4]
with no regard for law or discipline (idiom); flouting the law and disregarding all rules/in complete disorder
